oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. Sgt. Alvin C. York letter, September 24, 1919.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Sgt. Alvin C. York, The Alvin C. York Foundation, Nashville, TN, to Mrs. L. Crozier French, Knoxville, TN. September 24, 1919. Re: receipt of payment to the Alvin C. York Foundation for mountain schools. Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence;charitab; Charitable organizations;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sgt. Alvin C. York
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
